The Chaebol is the unique Stock Exchange replacement for South Korea. In addition to the normal bonuses of a Stock Exchange, the Chaebol boosts the production of Factories in Cities where the Chaebol is built. Chaebol produce additional Gold and increase the production of Great People for every International Trade Route the Empire controls. In addition, every Chaebol increases the Gold, Culture and Science of every other Chaebol in the empire; the more you build, the more they produce.

Chaebol are powerful multi-national corporations originating in South Korea. Beginning as family businesses, they grew by recieving government investment and relief, and were able to industrialise South Korea's agricultural society. Although the Chaebol were signs of success during the Miracle of the Han River, financial crashes later in the 20th century led to many collapsing - an event that the Korean people thought impossible.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Chaebols continue to dominate the South Korean economy and social fabric, and some like Samsung and Hyundai have become household names worldwide. Today, Chaebol account for over 80% of South Korea's exports, and the largest Chaebol controls 17% of the nation's GDP.
